website_summaries.verdict: Allure magazine named C-Firma Day Serum as a 2018 Best of Beauty Award winner for good reason – it delivers excellent results without artificial ingredients or harsh oils.
pros: Formulated with antioxidants, enzymes, and nutrients to tackle dead skin cells and plump fine lines
Suitable for all types of skin
Noticeably improved skin for most who try it
Only a few drops needed per application
cons: Texture is a bit sticky, and the scent isn't great, but these aren't deal-breakers considering the results most users experience

customer_reviews.title: This product does not seem to be the same product as the original product purchased from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product after using and loving the same product I purchased directly from the Drunk Elephant company. This is not the same product. It is watery and almost colorless compared to the original orange color of the real product. I am definitely returning this and have reported it to the Drunk Elephant company directly. I don't know what is going on here but something seems fishy.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy S

customer_reviews.title: ... using this product for a long Time now and love the think orangey serum and the way it makes ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a long Time now and love the think orangey serum and the way it makes your face glow and tingle after applying. This product is definitely not authentic. The serum was clear, odorless and felt different on my skin. Like a cheap generic serum in the Drunk Elephant packaging. Very disappointing (and illegal too, I think?). Have returned this product and will buy direct from Drunk Elephant moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Out of date product
customer_reviews.text: This had a sticker on it that said best of Allure magazine 2017..Why would that sticker be on there? I believe it’s very old or is a fake, it’s very clear and watery. I am returning. Does Amazon do anything to screen for authentic products ?
customer_reviews.author: 3timesalady

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical of product integrity
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was inconsistent with other DE products. Did not come in the original box, product label did not match other (notice the order of words in the item label), also the pump had product already dispensed as if it had already been used. Very skeptical of its integrity as a new product or even if it’s really Drunk Elephant. Returned and will purchase from actual website.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Product is not real Drunk Elephant. Fake. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie N.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received this product in the Drunk Elephant C-Firma Day Serum box but inside was a hair product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hutcheson

customer_reviews.title: Legit products and verified seller
customer_reviews.text: Was weary to purchase drunk elephant on amazon as the counterfeit skincare and cosmetic industry is booming and very dangerous with the ingredients. HOWEVER I ordered my go to skincare products the whole line from this seller and it was Exactly what I was looking for ! Products were legit and exactly as advertised. Also this seller is the ONLY seller on amazon that distributes drunk elephant products that they can verify! Thank you I will be buying again! The reason I buy here is so I can afford expensive great skincare on my amazon credit card and not on the direct website. Very nice to know it’s the same products !
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Legit DE
customer_reviews.text: This is the legit product from DE. The one on the right is from their website and one on the left is from Amazon. This product is amazing in removing hyperpigmentation. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Improved the look of my skin!
customer_reviews.text: It has improved the look of my skin in a very short time. I have been using this religiously since the end of July along with the Drunk Elephant Glycolic Night Serum. I am always getting compliments on my skin and most people believe I am younger than my actual age. The only thing is that this leaves my face feeling a little tacky but the overall appearance of my skin makes it worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great for your skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty good. It's not very liquid-y so it can be a bit hard to spread onto your face, but it goes well with your moisturizer. You know when you just KNOW that your skin loves something? That's how it is with this serum. It’s a quality product and I didn’t know how dehydrated and dry my face was until I started until this. It makes my skin look healthier & my makeup go on so much better. I use it on my face, neck,& & back of the hands as well!! I had to close my eyes and just swipe to purchase because of the price 😊 but I’m glad I did, it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyW0rld

customer_reviews.title: Normally great but this bottle defective??
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this in past and have been very happy with it until recently. While I keep the bottle stored in a dark area away from light, the C serum turned orange brown in just 2 weeks. I have not had this happen in the past. Maybe I received a defective bottle because it is usually a great product and doesn’t turn colors or oxidize so quickly. I was disappointed and asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Junnmara

customer_reviews.title: Great product but dont buy from amazon
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived very hot which can impact the potency. For an $80 item im not going to take any risks on potency given that this was not handled well in the shipping process, i get that im in a hot state in the summer but the container came very hot to touch and it was hot when applied to skin, this reduces the efficacy and potency of the actual L ascorbic acid. LAA is a very unstable product so buying it from amazon will only increase chances of it being unstable and not effective.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Hard yes
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this serum! I have been using it for about two weeks, and my skin has improved so much! My skin tone is more even, and my skin seems more youthful! I am going to be trying A LOT more products from this company because of how much I love this!
customer_reviews.author: anna gallaher

customer_reviews.title: Creates Blackheads and Oily Skin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this based on my dermatologist's recommendation, however, it gave me huge blackheads and very oily skin. So I discontinued it shortly after.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Product does not appear to be authentic DE
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is clearly not Drunk Elephant. The color is sheer orange (instead of vibrant orange), and does not smell and feel are off. I have ordered DE from Amazon in the past with no issues. I am very disappointed and am returning the defective product.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Best skincare ever
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and have tried so many product lines. This one really works. It is costly but I am worth the investment. This is my go to product line. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Marek

customer_reviews.title: The smell is really bad
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this as I love all of the other products I’ve used from them and was so disappointed. It smells like a campfire and the smell lingers all day. I tried for 2 days to get past it, but just couldn’t. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Use in the morning after applying warm cloth to open pores. Make sure you apply sunscreen as well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have reordered it twice. I have done some research about the benefits of vitamin C serum. It makes my skin brighter and healthier. I have head a few chemical peels done at dermatologist and the vitamin C serum is a great product for maintenace and over all glow!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Wells

customer_reviews.title: SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried tonsss of face regimens and this along with their daily moisturizer and evening face oil has been the best by far. My skin did initially purge (tiny bumps from not being used to it) but now it’s clearer and healthier looking than ever. Highly recommend! Obviously doesn’t have a super amazing smell since it’s a serum and that’s not it’s purpose but definitely well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelle Martin

customer_reviews.title: Shelf life and storage instructions must never included
customer_reviews.text: I love dunk elephant but super disappointed after this purchase. The whole product turned yellow after 1.5mo and it lost its potency after it turned yellow. I have also stored it in my fridge based on previous reviews. I think it does work but clearly shelf life and storage instructions have to be included. I would continue to use it if my product was replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Aparna Sharma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite serums. Use it consistently and you will see results.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle P.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This item didn’t work for me. The scent was quite off putting and it made my skin quite shiny. I used it for 3 weeks just to give it a chance but sadly my skin broke out from using it.
customer_reviews.author: Screen Savers, LLC

customer_reviews.title: 2 weeks and already noticing a difference
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this is helping my acne scars but it may just be in my head. Overall have felt more comfortable going makeup less since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: PharmaBabe

customer_reviews.title: This serum works so well there is no need to use it daily!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad to receive my Drunk Elephant Vit C serum! I tried it thru samples 1st and it worked really well without giving me any sensitivity, which is really important for me with my sensitive skin. I went without it for several months and it shows, so I got a gift card for my birthday and decided it was time to go for it because I really was amazed at how much it helped my skin bounce back and it helped my wrinkles and crows feet! And that was with only using it once or twice per week! 😃 So this large bottle should hopefully last me quite a while!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie J. Svetina

customer_reviews.title: Really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can actually see results in a week!!! Love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: creecree

customer_reviews.title: Horrible hotdog smell on skin
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the first few days and found it made my skin dewey at a price. It’s smelled TERRIBLE. The hot dog - bacon like smell stays with you all day. Others noticed it when sitting close to me. This line very expensive. I then bought 6 products prom the line and used together and my face broke out drastically.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica dimatteo

customer_reviews.title: This product caused me a Terrible rash!!!!😥😥😥😥😓😓😓
customer_reviews.text: I’m very frustrated with this product. I’m not sure I it’s a legitimate, but it caused me a terrible each all over my face. My skin is inflamed, itchy and red. I definitely not recommend this product. Please please be careful!!!! 🙏🙏🙏😥😥😥😥
customer_reviews.author: C. Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Saw immediate difference in my skin texture and firmness, and also age spots. Keep it in the fridge! A delightful treat every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Sue

customer_reviews.title: Too thick and oily for my combination skin.
customer_reviews.text: This left me skin so oily. The formula is sticky and thick and wouldn’t soak into my skin. I could kind of peel it off hours later. Not sure if that’s just because I have oily skin or the Vegas heat. It flared up my adult acne. I haven’t been able to tell if I’m getting results or not, but it hasn’t been effective enough to outweigh the issues for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your mlney
customer_reviews.text: Def over priced.. no change of my skin at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Radcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Great vitamin C serum! The smell isn’t great but the product is awesome for my skin. I keep it in the fridge and apply after washing and toning in the morning. My skin has never been happier!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very unpleasant scent
customer_reviews.text: I really disappointed about the scent of it. I don't think I'll use it. Not sure if it stayed inappropriate storage conditions before I receive it but if its the actual scent, I wouldn't recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bahadir Mimiroglu

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: My face is breaking out in tiny red spots. Allergic reaction?
customer_reviews.author: Gayle M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Daily Routine
customer_reviews.text: To me this is a holy grail product. I've been using this is combination with other products by Drunk Elephant for 6 months and noticed a huge improvement in my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Page

customer_reviews.title: These products WORK!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love all the Drunk Elephant products. Have been using them for over two years .
customer_reviews.author: Doris Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Everything was perfect. I have tried other drunken elephant product and I loved this particular serum. Order was received seemlessly. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: monica filpo

customer_reviews.title: Review later
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used the product long enough to see benefits, just arrived last week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product. Must use daily and be consistent units use to see results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect formula
customer_reviews.text: Really noticed an improvement in my skin tone. I’m not too dry and too oily. Love this product
customer_reviews.author: Lisa woolley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like this at all. It smelled very bad and made my face sticky, which did not go away with time.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It is not for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: After a month using the product I needed to go to the dermatologist because I had spots in my neck and face. The product caused irritation (eczema).
customer_reviews.author: Jimena Kho

customer_reviews.title: Not for Acne pron skin
customer_reviews.text: This was the only new product used at the time....one of the worst break outs I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IT’S FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This is not the Original!! Please don’t purchase it ! It like putting soap on your face
customer_reviews.author: Eslick Ubeda

customer_reviews.title: See above
customer_reviews.text: Used for vitamin C application. There are other products less pricey that do the job.
customer_reviews.author: priscilla bedolla

customer_reviews.title: ordered it one day and got it the next day
customer_reviews.text: liked it as a moisturizer and the delivery was very fast
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff ! Makes my skin firm and my complexion more even ... the best . Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: nicole carbonare

customer_reviews.title: Product came very quickly! This was my first time ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came very quickly! This was my first time using it, and it has really been helping my skin. I am surprised by how big of a difference it has made in such a short period of time
customer_reviews.author: runnergurl482

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it for 2 weeks but so far I like what it's doing to my face. No more random pimples, no more grease-ball look and I kind of detect a glow. I see some reviews saying it worked overnight...well, that didn't happen to me but I have melasma, which is extremely difficult to treat, so I wasn't expecting a miracle, I just wanted to improve my overall skin's appearance and health. Slowly but steady, this serum is working. Who knows, it might even help my melasma fade...fingers crossed! Update: it oxidized in less than three months so I stopped using it. Total disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Brown

customer_reviews.title: Stinky but great serum
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a this product thing, this is a vitamin c serum thing - they just stink. Plain and simple, they all don't smell good. I chose this product because the skinceuticals one is $160 a bottle and that seemed way too outrageous to me. $80 for this one was also pushing it but a lot of websites said this product was the best cheaper dupe to skin ceuticals. Things I love: - The twist pump. Cool design - Not irritating for my very sensitive skin - Little goes a long way
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Desai

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product at first!!
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would love a facial product outside my norm. This C firma serum was remarkable. The problem is, that it oxidized in less than a month of opening it. I kept it in a dark cool place, just as all Vit C serums need to be. But noticed about 3 days ago it went from a clear serum to yellowish. Today I went to apply it and the color has turned to an orangy color. Oxidation! BOO. This product should have lasted at least 3 months. I am returning it and will notify Drunk Elephant to see why that would have happened so soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Dee Lynn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I never found a product that is worthy of 5 stars but this product actually got rid of light brown spots on my face. Never thought I would ever find anything to get rid of them so I had laser done. But the spots came back even after the laser treatment. Then I decided to try this and it is the most amazing beauty product I've used. I put it on every morning, let it dry and then put on sun screen. Use it every day for several weeks for best results. LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Luv it.
customer_reviews.text: Hate the smell. Yuk!!!!! However it works very very well. I luv it. Just not the smell. It also transfers to clothing. Another disadvantage. But it is the balls for aging skin. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jaynie Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and has a musty smell, unsure about effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this product, but after using it for two months, I don't see any noticeable difference. The product is very sticky even after I put on makeup, and it has a smokey smell. I still have the same breakout patterns that I did before I purchased it, so unless I see a noticeable difference in my skin soon I won't be re-purchasing the product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I am in love
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this product for a few days but I already love it. I keep it in my frig and every morning use it after washing my face. The texture is slightly thick but what a serum should be. One pump is all you need. I love the way it feels and the glow I get from using it. I am hooked
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn D. Yearwood

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my late 40s. My skin looks great. Drunk Elephant products are simply wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny & Frank

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this twice from Sephora and the color was a very rich yellow/orange. This is very pale and just does not feel the same. Drunk Elephant could have changed the formulation. I don't know. I'll buy it for on Sephora next time and compare.
customer_reviews.author: CarpeVita

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, just got my second bottle. My skin looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Jones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it seemed like it was old. had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer salgado

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Yes! This product is great. Visible difference within a week. Addicted to DE.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Still testing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try something different that meets my needs (combination skin). Still testing out!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The hype isn’t worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This serum made no noticeable improvement to my skin tone or appearance. It left my skin quite sticky and even stung a little. The smell was also very unattractive. Maybe I had a bad batch or this is a rip off version? Either way, would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Thinking American

product_meta.title: Drunk Elephant C-Firma Day Serum. Brightening and Tightening Face Serum with 15 Percent Ascorbic Acid (1 Ounce / 30 Milliliters)
product_meta.description:
THE DRUNK ELEPHANT DIFFERENCE
With a mission to deliver clinically-effective, clean skincare products formulated with both cutting-edge synthetic and natural ingredients, Drunk Elephant knows that every ingredient should directly benefit the health of your skin or the safety of the formulation.

C-FIRMA DAILY SERUM
Uniquely formulated with pumpkin ferment and pomegranate extracts, C-Firma enzymatically dissolves dead surface skin cells for smoother texture. Sodium hyaluronate crosspolymer quickly penetrates skin and provides intense hydration. The result is a noticeably diminished appearance of photodamage, replaced by incredible radiance and luminosity. Plus, it has a reservoir effect, which means it will stay active on skin for up to 72 hours and cannot be washed or rubbed off. C-Firma has a pH level of 3.3 - 3.5, which Drunk Elephant believes is the key to a non-irritating, effective formulation that delivers real results.

NO FRAGRANCE
After carefully balancing the best ingredients available, Drunk Elephant doesn’t have to add anything to mask their natural scents. When you smell their products, you will likely detect nothing but a glycerin base with slight hints of Marula oil, Zinc Oxide, Thermal Mud, Fruit Enzymes, and Vitamins for a refreshing and reassuring scent.

COMMITTED TO CLEAN
Drunk Elephant is committed to using only clean ingredients that either directly benefit the skin’s health, or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulas. You’ll never find the “Suspicious 6” (Essential Oils, Drying Alcohols, Silicones, Chemical Screens, Fragrances/Dyes and SLS) in their products.
feature_bullets: C-FIRMA DAY SERUM. A super-potent vitamin C day serum packed with powerful antioxidants, essential nutrients, fruit enzymes and a chronopeptide that all work together to firm and brighten the appearance of skin while improving the signs of photoaging

REVOLUTIONARY SERUM. Packed with a 15% potent antioxidant complex of l-ascorbic and ferulic acids plus vitamin E, this serum helps neutralize pollution, environmental stressors and free radicals while replenishing lipids and reducing the appearance of dark spots and wrinkles

NO QUESTION IN QUALITY. A routine is only as good as its worst product, and a product is only as good as its worst ingredient. Drunk Elephant is dedicated to your internal health and external skin health; "If there's any DOUBT, it's OUT.”

SENSITIVE VS. SENSITIZED. When skin is exposed to irritants and sensitizers, damage can be imperceptible and cumulative, leaving it in a reactive mode. "Sensitive" skin is often just skin that has become sensitized over time by harsh additives

MADE IN THE USA. Drunk Elephant doesn’t take shortcuts or compromise ingredients to save money. They are hands-on and will stay true to their ethos. Their products are designed, tested and made in the United States. Drunk Elephant is certified cruelty-free, they have never, nor will ever, animal test or allow products to be tested on animals.
